title: Single Dumbbell / One Arm Lateral Raises / Side Flyes / Shoulder Abductions
description: Hold one dumbbell at each side of your body. Keep your back straight and your knees ever-so-slightly bent. Raise one dumbbell out to the side, keeping your arm slightly bent. Once the dumbbell reaches the same level as your ear slowly lower it back down to the starting position. Repeat the same movement on the opposite side.
